29.3. [Hrabanus Maurus] Abbreviated Commentary on Genesis.
Commentary | Genesis
Manuscripts:
1. Cambrai, Bibliothèque municipale 304, f. 1-83. saec. xii2; Ourscamp, Notre-Dame. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
2. Einsiedeln, Stiftsbibliothek 184 (190), p. 1-184. saec. x ex; O: Einseldeln (Hoffmann). No attribution in MS. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S)
3. Karlsruhe. Badische Landesbibliothek Perg. Aug. CCXXXI, f. 27v-54r. saec. ix. Reichenau. No attribution in MS. Short version. *
4. Laon, Bibliothèque municipale 5, f. 5rb-132r. saec. xii. Val-Saint-Pierre. Attributed to Hrabanus Maurus in MS. Capitula (version 2).*
5. Orléans, Bibliothèque municipale 31 (28), p. 1a-76b. saec. ix. Fleury. Up to line 1129 missing. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. *
6. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 9568, f. 15va-62vb. saec. xi. No attribution in MS. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus. *
7. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 12307, f. 1ra-90ra. saec. xii. Corbie. Attributed to Hrabanus in MS. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S)*
8. Sankt Gallen, Stiftsbibliothek 283, p. 2-297. saec. ix. Attributed to Rabanus in MS.Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
9. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 31, f. 2ra-72rb. saec. xiii. Clairvaux. Attributed to Strabus in MS. Followed by Walahfrid on Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
10. Valencia, Universitat 392, f. 120v-164vb. saec. xv. Attributed to Walahfrid in MS. (S) *
11. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4109 (Weissenburg 25), f. 2r-121r. saec. ix2. P: Weissenburg. No attribution in MS. *
12. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4171 (Weissenburg 87), f. 69r-97v. saec. ix2. P: Weissenburg; Sponheim. No attribution in MS.*
13. Wurzburg, Universitätbibliothek Mp. Theol. Fol. 60, f. 1-38. saec. ix mid. Fulda.*
